name: Deer
description: A graceful, herbivorous creature with a slender body and brown coat. Male deer may sport impressive antlers.
memorable: Highly agile and skittish, always ready to flee from threats.
goals: Forage on grasses and shrubs, maintain natural balance.
relations: Often found in the company of other wildlife in forests or grasslands.
environment: Forests, grasslands, and near freshwater sources.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity enhances speed and ability to evade threats.
weaknesses: Fragile with low hit points; lacks combat capabilities.
attacks: Can bite or headbutt, dealing minimal piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Smell allows for heightened awareness of threats from a distance.
senses: Possesses a keen sense of smell, providing advantage on related Perception checks.
skills: Good perception represented by a Wisdom score of 14.
additional_information: Characterized by fragile nature with just 4 hit points.
Poor intelligence indicates minimal problem-solving ability.
Skittish nature prompts quick escape from danger.
Swift movement aids in evasion and survival.
test_queries: timid animal that forages for food
brown coat animal known for evasive speed
